title: Meal log
description: Each entry records a meal eating on a specific date and time.

calendar_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date of data entry.

timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of data entry.

location_id.description: location where the meal took place.

person_id.description: the person who ate the meal.

meal_duration_minutes.description: the length in minutes for the meal to complete.

meal_was_balanced.description: indicates whether or not the person felt the meal was balanced.

meal_was_sufficient.description: indicates whether or not the person felt the meal was sufficient.

meal_was_nutritious.description: indicates whether or not the person felt the meal was nutritious.
